items.title: Judge denies Trump's request to halt sentencing in his criminal hush money case
items.description: Judge Juan Merchan on Monday refused a request from President-elect Trump to halt the sentencing in his criminal hush money case.

items.title: Cold weather alerts from New Mexico to Florida, with another winter storm expected
items.description: Wind chills are near 20 degrees all the way south to the Gulf Coast.

items.title: 2 found dead in JetBlue landing gear compartment after flight, airline says
items.description: It was unclear how they accessed the aircraft, JetBlue said.

items.title: WATCH:  Chinese city unveils magical ice and snow festival
items.description: China's city of Harbin unveiled its annual Ice and Snow Festival this week, which features sculptures, castles and even huge ice slides.

items.title: 4 years after Jan. 6 insurrection, Kamala Harris certifies Trump's election win
items.description: Lawmakers met on Monday for a joint session of Congress to certify President-elect Donald Trump's 2024 victory.
